name: Dats Lost Lab in nightmare and failure
name_original: Dats Lost Lab in nightmare and failure
description: One day in 2020 Dat decided to go to the laboratory to do some jobs after he has return to the laboratory he saw the laboratory is abondoned and old and he also see so many dead bodies. 50 of them murdered in laboratory to find out who murdered 50 people you need to collect 22 notebooks or else Dat would turn into a monster
